p: Results: Before FBS, LUS pattern wasn’t specific for VAP: both patients had only bilateral consolidations with no air-bronchogram (Fig. 16a,c). After FBS, LUS pattern changed. In patient 1, the tissue-like pattern turned into B-lines (Fig. 16b). BAL was negative. In patient 2, the same tissue-like pattern was visualized after FBS; a dynamic arborescent air-bronchogram appeared (Fig. 16d). BAL had P.Aeruginosa 10(6) CFU/ml.
